Package com.lows

Interface Summary
LoWSExtendedType This is the interface class for all extended (flexible) LoWS types.
LoWSReducedType This is the interface class for all reduced LoWS types.
 

Class Summary
AccessPoint The class that stores all Access Point parameters, an List of this class is used to store the current IEEE 802.11 scan results.
AlarmClickActivity This Activity is started by the BackgroundScanner after a notification has been generated and the user has tapped on this notification TODO: -As described in the ClickActivity class, the CB_CHECK_INTERVAL should be made adjustable via the settings of the application.
BEPSLoWSReducedType This class holds the standard definition of the BEPS reduced LoWS type it implements the LoWSReducedType interface plus some other functions.
BuildConfig  
ClickActivity This Activity is started when a user taps on a single item of the ListView displayed via the ResultListFragment, this activity lists details about the specifc LoWS and allows the setting of search strings.
CodeBookUpdaterService This is the codebook update service TODO: -Make the global codebook address server IP address (CODEBOOK_ADDRESS_SERVER) adjustable via the settings menu.
DebugFragment This is the debug fragment that can be accessed from the ResultListFragment when swiping to the right.
LoWS This is the general LoWS class, a list of this class objects is maintained to manage all the LoWS message processing.
LowsActivity Main LoWS Receiver Application Activity TODO: - rename extended LoWS to flexible LoWS everywhere in the code - Make variable backgroundScannerInterval adjustable from the Settings Menu - Implement fragmentation management, signature detection and encryption detection in function parseExtendedOptionByte() - Implement Type handling with type number longer than one byte for extended (flexible) LoWS types in function parseExtendedType() - Implement Security byte handling, Signature validation and service data encryption detection in function parseExtendedSecurityByte(), this includes the detection of encryption type and signature type - Implement signature validation functionality and service data decryption functionality.
LowsActivity.PrefsFragment  
LowsAdapter LoWS ListView Adapter This class is used for the ListView in the ResultListFragment class for displaying the LoWS found in current vicinity
LowsBackgroundAlarmScanner This class implements the LoWS Background Scanner Service, this IntentService is executed periodically by the AlarmManager which is set within the LowsActivity class.
LowsPreferenceActivity This class is used to manage the Settings (Preferences) Menu
PlaceholderFragment Deprecated.  
PSALoWSReducedType This class implements the Physical Service Announcement LoWS type via the LoWSReducedType interface class TODO: -Enable searching for PSA types
R  
R.attr  
R.dimen  
R.drawable  
R.id  
R.layout  
R.menu  
R.raw  
R.string  
R.style  
R.xml  
ResultListFragment ListView Fragment which is displayed when LoWS Main Receiver Application starts.
SectionsPagerAdapter A FragmentPagerAdapter that returns a fragment corresponding to one of the sections/tabs/pages.
STLoWSExtendedType This class implements the String Type LoWS type via the LoWSExtendedType interface class TODO: -Enable searching for String Types
WTNLoWSExtendedType This class implements the Waiting Ticket Number Service LoWS type via the LoWSExtendedType interface class
